mapper.insert: insert into bt003_career ( employee_id ,certification_no ,disp_order ,start_yearmonth ,end_yearmonth ,business_content ,biko ,insert_user ,insert_date ,update_user ,update_date ) values ( #{employee_id} ,nextval('career_seq') ,cast(#{disp_order} as integer) ,#{start_yearmonth} ,#{end_yearmonth} ,#{business_content} ,#{biko} ,#{insert_user} ,NOW() ,NULL ,NULL )
mapper.select: select a.employee_id ,a.certification_no ,a.disp_order ,a.start_yearmonth ,a.end_yearmonth ,a.business_content ,a.biko from bt003_career a where a.employee_id = #{employee_id} and a.certification_no = cast(#{certification_no} as integer)

select a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,b.certification_no ,b.disp_order ,b.start_yearmonth ,b.end_yearmonth ,b.business_content ,b.biko from am005_employee a inner join bt003_career b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id where a.employee_id = #{employee_id} and COALESCE(b.business_content ,'') like CONCAT('%' , #{business_content} , '%') and COALESCE(b.biko,'') like CONCAT('%' , #{biko} , '%') order by b.disp_order ,b.start_yearmonth

select a.employee_id ,a.employee_cd ,a.employee_name1_last ,a.employee_name1_first ,b.certification_no ,b.disp_order ,b.start_yearmonth ,b.end_yearmonth ,b.business_content ,b.biko from am005_employee a inner join bt003_career b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id where a.employee_id = #{employee_id} order by b.disp_order ,b.start_yearmonth
